title: Seller Management System â€“ Document & Seller Detail Enhancements
description: This PRD defines incremental changes to the existing internal Seller Management System. It covers only newly requested behavior and modifications and assumes all previously defined and implemented functionality remains unchanged.

changes.problem: Documents are now stored in Google Drive, but the UI and data model do not clearly represent this.
requirements: Documents must be represented only as Google Drive references.
Each document record must store and display the following fields: file name, tag, and Google Drive link.
Document links must be clickable and open in a new browser tab.
The document list must be displayed in a clear, structured layout suitable for frequent internal use.
explicit_removals: Any UI or logic related to external file uploads - REMOVED
ui_expectations: Use shadcn/ui Table or List components to render document lists
Tags should be visually represented using shadcn/ui Badge components

changes.problem: Seller records do not currently capture ownership and service context clearly.
requirements: While creating or editing a seller, allow optional Account Manager information to be captured.
Account Manager details must include name, mobile number, and email address.
Account Manager information must not be mandatory and must not block seller creation.
ui_expectations: Account Manager fields should be grouped logically using shadcn/ui Form components
Optional fields should be clearly marked as optional

changes.problem: There is no single place to capture what services are being offered to a seller.
requirements: Add a single free-text note field on the seller profile for capturing service name(s).
The field should accept plain text and be editable after seller creation.
ui_expectations: Field should be placed prominently within the seller profile

non_goals: Refactoring unrelated UI or backend logic
success_criteria: Users can view a clean, readable list of Google Drive documents with name, tag, and link
One-time upload links are fully removed from the system
Account Manager details can be optionally added to sellers
Service names can be captured in a dedicated seller note field
UI changes consistently use shadcn/ui components and appear visually polished
